Title: Emma.
Writer: Eleanor Catton (screenplay by), Jane Austen (based on the novel by)
Actors: Anya Taylor-Joy, Angus Imrie, Letty Thomas, Gemma Whelan
Plot: In 1800s England, a well meaning but selfish young woman meddles in the love lives of her friends.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 29 nominations.
